email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 20-25. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider $51.00 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the vessel’s availability and any additional terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your reply. I’ve checked with the owner, and we can adjust the freight rate to $51.50 per metric ton. The MV Ocean Star is confirmed available for the laycan. Demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.50 sounds reasonable. We’re good to proceed. Could you send over the charter party agreement for review? Also, please confirm the laytime start and end dates. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll send the charter party agreement shortly. The laytime will start on October 20 at 12:00 and end on October 25 at 12:00. Let me know if you need any further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. I’ve reviewed the charter party agreement, and everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the booking. Please confirm once finalized. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the booking is now finalized. The MV Ocean Star is confirmed for your shipment. I’ll send you the final confirmation shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah
